lead_paragraph: With all the criticism surrounding Serena Williams after her outburst at the U.S. Open, William C. Rhoden wonders if we would have had a similar reaction had a male acted the same way.
snippet: With all the criticism surrounding Serena Williams after her outburst at the U.S. Open, William C. Rhoden wonders if we would have had a similar reaction had a male acted the same way.
